entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, Cape Dorset
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:00 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Dorset Airport 07:00 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: SW 41 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016
